==Welcome to documentation for this TempleOS emulator
This website is about the software this wiki is running on which is an implementation of a TempleOS runtime under Linux,Windows and FreeBSD. Code here should work also under TempleOS. Here are some links to get started,but this website is still under construction. If you want to Contibute,you'll have to ask *enzymical@duck.com* as this server is under development.
